storyInfo: At the top of the tower, Cecelia sings an ancient Sarkaz folk song. Suddenly, bells begin to ring. The old man whom the masses call the 'Pope' asks thus: Is this good or bad?

attributes.text: The bell tower's corridors are narrow, and the stone steps below my feet are slippery and wet. The stone walls are rough and feel so cold to the touch... just like the trees in that forest.
My footsteps echo in the hallway. What is there up ahead?
I'm the child of a Sankta and a Sarkaz. They all said that they have on me their...
I don't know. It was a word I've never heard.
But I remember how Rosella looked.
She looked down at me with a smile on her face. Her hands were clasped together like she was holding onto a treasure.
What did they... What did everyone want me to do? I still don't get it.
But now, I understand what it is that I should do the most and what it is that I want to do.
It doesn't matter if I'm a Sankta or a Sarkaz.
Goodbye, Mamma... Will you keep watching over me?

attributes.content: Ezell, your eleven o'clock.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Ngh!
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: That was close!
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Come on, it's not like fighting is going to get us anywhere. Why don't we call it quits?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: You really don't know how to listen, huh?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Ezell, I thought you were really worried about Cecelia. She might just be safer with me, you know?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Did you think I'd believe that?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: I'm never one to lie.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Even if you're telling the truth, if that isn't what Cecelia wants, then there's no way!
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Sometimes I really think Andoain's giving me way more than I bargained for.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Stay focused, Ezell.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: No... Federico!
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Can you feel it?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Well, look at that...
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.text: As though something is manifesting from nothingness.
A surge of power, pure power, nothing like any Originium Arts known to man.
An ancient construction is being awakened.
A forgotten sound is about to ring out far and wide.

attributes.content: Ezell, new directive: investigate the bell tower.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Leave the traitorous Legatus to me.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Your Holiness, what's going on?!
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Shh—
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Velliv, seal off the central sanctuary and halt all meetings.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: What is happening?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Did you know? My predecessor, the last Pope, had an interest in history.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I don't blame you. He was an amateur in the field. His writings were riddled with mistakes and hardly worthy of praise.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Rather than studying history, perhaps it's better to say that his interests lay in using history to let his imagination run wild.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: He was particularly fond of certain... romantic metaphors in his writings. Perhaps a little promiscuous for a history paper, but they did truly leave an impression on his readers.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: He said, 'History is a musical movement written by a shapeless titan in countless voices.'
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Going by his analogy, our titan musician seems to have started writing his next measure.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: I breathe all the air out of my lungs before drawing a fresh breath.
I trip and fall to the ground, before climbing back up and running forward again.
I can feel that something is brewing.
The other side of the door at the top of the bell tower is where Cecelia is.
I open the door—
The frail girl is singing.
An ancient Sarkaz folk song.
She is singing from the bottom of her heart, so tenderly, with all her feelings.
I can only stand there, doing my best to hold my breath, to avoid disrupting the flow of her singing.
At a certain point, I realize I cannot hear anything anymore.
There is only the sound of bells, seemingly ringing across time.
Bells... from the Tower of Revelations...? That's impossible!
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: That bell has never rung!
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Except... except when...
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: When the first saint still walked the land.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: 'During the day, the Sankta looked up at the sky to find darkness shrouding even the sun. At night, the devil's army came and slaughtered countless Sankta. The Sankta lost much of their radiance.'
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: 'The saints said: follow me. Thus they rose. The saints said: listen to me. Thus, the bells began to ring.'
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: 'The bells echoed throughout the wilderness, uniting all the Sankta.'
attributes.name: Agitated Citizen

attributes.content: 'This is a revelation. This is an exhortation.'
attributes.name: Devout Citizen

attributes.content: 'There will be light throughout the day, and it shall never be shrouded again.'
attributes.name: Agitated Citizen

attributes.content: 'The saints said: build a city. It will be the Sankta's paradise.'
attributes.name: Devout Citizen

attributes.content: 'The saints said: this city shall be called Lateran.'
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: How...?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: The Tower of Revelations is one of the oldest structures in Laterano. No, according to the texts, the Tower of Revelations was here before there was a Laterano.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: And now the holy bells ring again...
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: For our little Cecelia.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: But... why?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Perhaps the shapeless titan musician wanted some crescendos in his music, and he picked Lateran bells for his arrangement because he liked the sound.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Cardinal Velliv, you and I stand in this church at this moment. I wonder if that is good or bad.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Your Holiness, we must know immediately why the holy bells are ringing... No, no matter the reason, it is the responsibility of the Church to explain why and how it happened.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: With envoys from the nations gathered in Laterano, all of the attending representatives are now witnesses to this event. This could be an opportunity.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Go, Velliv. Inform the envoys that the Lateran bells ring for the first time in millennia, and this portends change. We must come together and prepare for the future.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: What about the Tower of Revelations, then...?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: We have waited long enough. Let's get to work.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Guide, did... did you know this was going to happen? What exactly is Cecelia...? S-She's mixed-race, but... is there some other secret about her?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: No, of course not. She's the Cecelia that both you and I know. She may come from a unique background, but there is no secret to her.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: It's just that, perhaps Laterano itself is thirsting for change, and Cecelia... she just so happened to be in the right place at the right time.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Or perhaps, she is actually the one who will end the thousand year conflict between the Sarkaz and the Sankta, and so Revelation came and the bells rang.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Of course, it could also just be a misunderstanding, a coincidence, a kind of black humor in the course of history.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: But we both know that the truth is never what's actually important.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Hmm... No matter what, this is an opportunity. If I have to say, it might even be proof that we are actually blessed.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: The Church is most likely putting all their attention on the envoys and the Tower of Revelations right now...
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: We'll pave the path forward for you. You need only walk it.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Andoain... the bells have started to ring.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: The bells belong to a child who is about to begin her journey.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: You sound very relaxed. You've made your decision.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: My decision has never changed.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Even if you must give up everything?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Even if I must give up everything.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Is there any meaning in this?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Meaning... Meaning does not exist for nothing. All our choices merely conceive it, mold it, and give it the chance to descend upon us.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: I get it now.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I hope you'll find your peace.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Patia, what you just said goes against our original goal.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: All men are cornerstones, and the roads that we lay are paved for those who follow us.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: I must see His Holiness right now!
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Gun-Knight Talvadore, His Holiness is praying right now. No one can see him.
attributes.name: Friar

attributes.content: But!
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Please understand.
attributes.name: Friar

attributes.content: An explosion?
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Probably another one of the people's pranks.
attributes.name: Friar

attributes.content: No! The explosion came from the envoys' village. We stopped handing out approvals for explosive activities there!
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: G...Gun-Knight Talvadore, the envoys' village is under attack, and there have been multiple fires and explosions all across the city!
attributes.name: Pontifica Cohors

attributes.content: It's the Astray! They can't sit still now that the holy bells have sounded, can they?
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: There are Gun-Knights stationed in the envoys' village, but... after the ambush and explosions started, the envoys started demanding more Gun-Knights to protect them.
attributes.name: Pontifica Cohors

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Dammit, why now of all times?!
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Cardinal Velliv!
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: The bells of the Tower of Revelations are ringing. This is the holiest moment in Lateran history. We even get to share this with the first 'Summit of Nations' and the envoys of all the lands. How joyous.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Yet the heretics' remnants are taking the opportunity to sow chaos. They plot to disrupt the conference and overshadow Laterano's radiance.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Gun-Knight Talvadore, by order of the Apostle Himself, the Pope, you are to go to the envoys' village and defend them alongside the Gun-Knights there, thus ensuring the Summit of Nations will commence as planned.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I will accompany you.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Very well. Your Eminence, if I may...
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: I'm sure you've noticed as much, but the energy that's surging from the Tower of Revelations...
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Watch your words, Reverend Gun-Knight.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: That is glory itself.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Lemuen, did he do this?!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Maybe...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: You're still going to cover for him?!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Fiammetta, come here.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: What for?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Come here.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I shouldn't have said what I said the other day.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Let go of me...
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Not until you forgive me.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I AM mad at you.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: But there's something else I'm even angrier about.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: And it might just be me.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I want you to trust me on one thing, Fiammetta.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: If he really wanted to do harm to Laterano... I'd never forgive him.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Then what is it he's trying to do?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Maybe... He's just asking a question.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Of who?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: His Holiness.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: And what is he asking him?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: A question that the Sankta must never ask.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: You can't be more specific?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I'm not entirely sure myself, you see... This question has probably been bothering him deep in his mind for a long time... He hasn't ever told me about it. I've just got a hunch.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: But it's true. What happened eight years ago has something to do with the question.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Wait... so, Mostima, you knew about this?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Of course not. I'm not Lemuen.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: She might understand him. Me, though? I didn't think he was worthy, that's all.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: If you ask me, he's a poor little guy. And I have something more important to take care of, so let's leave it at that.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: How come it feels like you're ticking me off even more than Lemuen?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: You and I are different. I did everything I could. And you... I'm guessing you would probably rather it was me, right?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Lemuen, what else do you know? Tell me.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I thought you didn't want to hear any of it?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I have to hear to find out.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Cecelia La Porta, by order of the Apostle Himself, the Pope, I am here to protect you.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Because the bells started ringing?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Are they ringing because of me?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I cannot say.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Please follow me to the Basilica at once.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: It's okay, Mister Ezell. Don't worry.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Let's go.
attributes.name: Cecelia
